column7: Filters

TO DO LIST
Specify Jobs - Only for Sales Role (jobs for you and your staff as salespersons.)
Inspect Jobs - Only for Operations Role (jobs for you or your staff as operations supervisors.)
Quote Jobs - Only for Sales Role (jobs for you as and your staff)
Receive PO - Only for Sales Role (jobs for you as and your staff)
Schedule Jobs - Only for Operations Role (jobs for you or your staff as operations supervisors.)
Job Starts - Only for Operations Role (jobs for you or your staff as operations supervisors.)
Job Completes - Only for Operations Role (jobs for you or your staff as operations supervisors.)
Sign Off & Invoice - Only for Sales Role (jobs for you as and your staff)
Look for Payment - for Accounting Role (jobs for you as and your sales staff)
Read Job Order Notes - for Everyone (Notes that are addressed to you but not marked as reviewed.

Job Order Group Restrictions

The Job Order list restrictions for The Operations group
Determined by group XML: < filter > operations < /filter >
Price is hidden from list and form
New: discount is also hidden.
List results only show jobs that are set as having this supervisor or staff under this supervisor.
Also only show jobs in this supervisors region.

The Job list restrictions for Sales Group
Determined by group XML: < filter >sales< /filter >
List results only show jobs that are set as having this sales person or staff under this sales person.

Form also limits Company choices to those in region if either filter above is true.

column6: When you don't have Microsoft Office...
column7:
When you don't have Microsoft Office...


All of the documents on this site work with Open Office.
Open Office  is a free Microsoft compatible product originally developed by Sun Microsystems.
Download it at http://download.openoffice.org/index.html

New S-13

A new S-13 report has been created which replaces all of the old S-13 forms.  It requires that you have Adobe Acrobat 7.0 reader on you computer.  Earlier versions of Acrobat do not work well with this report.

Download Adobe Reader.

Printing is very easy; just click on the print icon just above the document itself:

Intranet Help and What's New

New Notes To Do item

There is a new Notes item in your To DO list which shows notes that have been sent to you but not marked reviewed.  When you click on the To Do item for a note, it should take you to the Job Order and pop-up the note.  If the note does not pop-up, the browser propably has a security restriction message about pop-ups near the top.  Click on the message and choose 'Allow pop-ups from glassfusion.com'.  Pop-ups will work after you do this.

Please Download and Install Firefox.

If you haven't already done so, please download and install Firefox.  Firefox is known to work very well with Intranet based applications like this.
Instructions:
  1. Click Here to Start.
  2. Click on the 'Download' button.
  3. When asked to 'Run' or 'Save', choose Run.
  4. Follow all instructions, and allow the installation to add an icon to your desktop.
  5. When installation is complete, click on the new 'FireFox' desktop icon and navigate to this URL: https://www.siltanium.com:10441/intra/
  6. Go to the Firefox menu 'Tools', then go to the 'Options' dropdown menu item. This should bring up the Options Dialog.
  7. On the General section, click on the "Use Current Page" button.
Thats It! 
From now on, all you have to do is click on the 'Firefox' icon to get to this application.

Note:  Apple MAC OSX users should use the Camino web browser instead of Firefox.  Firefox will work, but Camino was written specifically for a MAC by the same people that created Firefox. 
The MAC OSX native browser 'Safari' will also work. 
(Safari has some issues with the content editor which will not effect you if you are not editing the web site.)

1/29/2008 - Latest Changes...

The To Do to Notes interface has been changed because of changes in browser security.

Browsers make it very hard to have a window pop-up on the event of a new page loading.  This is how the To Do to Notes task action worked.

It now asks you to 'Click Here' to have the Not dialog show, which is legal and reliable in all browsers because the user explicitly asked for the action.

New Operations Report
There is a new report under the Operations category intended for the Operations Supervisor.
